text: This is the first slide with an image. It demonstrates how the script handles static images with text-to-speech audio.
This is the second slide featuring a video. The script will loop this video if it's shorter than the audio duration.
Here's another image slide. Notice how the script seamlessly transitions between different media types.
It even pads the images and videos that have a different aspect ratio.
This was built by Arkadeep with help from Claude and Pexels along with some emperor penguins in Antarctica. Isn't this the best thing ever?
